title: This American Life - The Complete Archives Vol. 1 (1995-1996)
description:
This American Life - The Complete Archives Vol. 1 (1995-1996)
uploaded by Reverend Mediocre

This is Volume 1 of a continuing series of releases with the aim of having the entire WBEZ This American Life archives available in MP3 format. 

Vol. 1 includes the 47 episodes comprising the first two years of Ira Glasses popular public radio program. Until episode #17, the program was known as \\\\\\\"Your Radio Playhouse\\\\\\\", after which it became \\\\\\\"This American Life\\\\\\\". Several of the very early episodes have since been re-made as \\\\\\\"This American Life\\\\\\\" with the same stories but new introductions and replaced the original episodes in the archive. These are pulled straight from the WBEZ streaming archives. 

If you like This American Life, and other public radio programs, SUPPORT PUBLIC RADIO! Give to National Public Radio, give to Public Radio International (who distributes This American Life), I make these available because I love the program and think that episodes should be more readily available to put on your personal listening device, but without support from listeners like you and I quality programming like This American Life is not possible.
